rows.label: tev024501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Joy about her work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Joy if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Joy about the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Joy about damage suffered in the attack.

rows.label: tev024501_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Joy if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Joy about the people of NLA.

rows.label: tev024501_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Joy about recent developments.

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0001
rows.name:
I work as a counselor. ...Hmm? You're asking why
I'm not working now? On the contrary, I'm taking
one of my own treatments![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0002
rows.name:
Now that the dust has settled from our crash landing,
people are becoming more psychologically vulnerable
to stress-related flashbacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0003
rows.name:
Personally, I advise my clients to come here and play
sports rather than popping pills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Sports are a wonderful treatment. Sweating together
deepens bonds and washes the grime off our brains.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0005
rows.name:
And if you still don't believe me, I'll prove it by
challenging you to a match![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0006
rows.name:
After our game, I know you'll look just as refreshed as
Charles does.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0008
rows.name:
Even BLADEs have their movements restricted until they
acclimate themselves to the job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0009
rows.name:
After they've completed a couple of major missions,
however, they're considered a full-fledged BLADE and
can go wherever they please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0010
rows.name:
Once you're that confident in your own skills,
why not set off for some remote destination?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0011
rows.name:
As soon as you experience the true majesty of Mira's
landscape, you'll begin to fully appreciate the
magnitude of what BLADE is trying to accomplish.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Have you seen how the Ma-non play? It's delightful!
They can experience the game in a way that we who
are constrained by the rules cannot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0021
rows.name:
They possess incredible technology,
yet speak and behave almost like children.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0022
rows.name:
Perhaps within those habits lies the secret to their
technological prowess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0023
rows.name:
But when I suggested as much to Charles,
he just claimed that they're happy-go-lucky
and put an end to the conversation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0028
rows.name: I am truly glad the Ma-non came for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0029
rows.name:
Thanks to them, the civilian population of New LA
was spared from having to see combat firsthand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0030
rows.name:
Unlike you BLADEs, we civilians are unaccustomed to
warfare. So to have our own city attacked...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0031
rows.name:
Needless to say, it has been a source of anxiety that
many people wish to discuss with me. And naturally,
it's an anxiety that I feel as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0032
rows.name:
If I didn't have sports to clear my head and heart,
I don't know how I could go on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0037
rows.name:
Have you heard the rumors of small islands in the far
reaches of Mira's ocean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0038
rows.name:
BLADEs have apparently found a number of them in a
variety of locations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0039
rows.name:
The image of an island at the end of the sea inspires
such exciting memories of the Age of Discovery![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0045
rows.name:
Lately, in my job as counselor, the discussion topics
that I've been dealing with have changed a great deal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0046
rows.name:
People want to talk about their anxiety for the future.
That itself is nothing new, but the futures they see are
now far brighter that the ones they imagined previously.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0047
rows.name:
My clients talk of marrying and starting a family,
or finding a career beyond BLADEâ€”topics that are
better suited for this court than a counselor's office![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0048
rows.name:
I imagine returning to our fleshly bodies will dredge up
new anxieties. But for now, I hope we can take some
time to reflect upon our newfound peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0049
rows.name:
I taught the rules of tennis to the Orphean, Ton'barac.
He absorbed them and was ready to play right away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0050
rows.name:
He's already a master of tennis tactics and theory.
If he could just commit some moves to muscle memory, 
he could easily be the best player in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0051
rows.name:
The only issue is that he seems to view tennis not as
a sport, but as some sort of human...ritual.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024501_MSG0052
rows.name: A ritual venting of stress, perhaps?[ST:wait ]
